name: Elevator_Stealth
description:
Eliminate the 5 targets as seen in the bottom right.

CONTROLS:

AD: Move Left and Right

W: Jump, Move elevator up, enter red door

S: Crouch, move elevator down.

Space: Punch

Game made by a bunch of grad students at EAE for a two weeks Rapid Prototyping class

Jialiang Zhao

William Rockwell

Wenjia Bian

Yiqi Wu

Ben Fellows
